title: DRC may be used on plots / land available with the owner after surrendering the required land and construction to the Authority under the provisions of Accommodation Reservation
clause_text: DRC may be used on plots / land available with the owner after surrendering the required land and construction to the Authority under the provisions of Accommodation Reservation. In such circumstances, for the purpose of deciding receiving potential of the plot for the Transferable Development Rights (TDR), the total area of the reservation before surrender shall be considered. No infrastructure improvement charges shall be paid for utilisation of TDR.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
